<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/associations"}></MethodEndpoint>

Get a list of associations

Support:

| Provider    | Supported |
| ----------- | --------- |
| Hubspot     | Yes       |
| Salesforce  | Yes       |
| Pipedrive   | No        |
| MS Dynamics | No        |
